name: Cube Master 3D-Merge Puzzle
description:
Cube Master 3D is a very simple and addictive digital merger game. What you need to do is slide your finger to merge the two cube of the same number into a new cube. You can get points. Come and play this fun game with your friends and get high scores! !
2 > 4 > 8 > 16 > 128 > 256 > 512 > 1024 > 2048.
